quote: It is rather whenWe gloriously forget ourselves, and plungeSoul-forward, headlong, into a book's profound,Impassioned for its beauty and salt of truth--'Tis then we get the right good from a book.
quote_letters: IT IS RATHER WHENWE GLORIOUSLY FORGET OURSELVES AND PLUNGESOUL-FORWARD HEADLONG INTO A BOOKS PROFOUNDIMPASSIONED FOR ITS BEAUTY AND SALT OF TRUTH--TIS THEN WE GET THE RIGHT GOOD FROM A BOOK
